channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

item.title: Report X-2023120077
item.description:
Report X-2023120077

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-23
  • City: MAGNA
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was discovered leaking, box was immediately placed into red hazmat tote with hazmat liner DescribePack: Two closure lids on top one secure the other is a small cap that was mostly unscrewed inside container and cause spillage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed in hazmat tot with hazmat liner and taken to hazmat cage to be processed. Any package handle that touched or may have touched package instructed to wash hands before returning to work.

item.description:
Report X-2023111236

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: NORTH SALT LAKE
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: LEAKING DURING TRANSIT, UNLOADED, PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND A RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: VENETED CAPS LEAKING CORROSIVE OXIDIZER LIQUID INSIDE WET SOILED BOX SOILING ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND A RED HAZMAT TOTE.
